Yahoo now tracks more than 100 cryptocurrencies. So much for limited supply. Fiat money might be more supply-constrained!

Most perplexing is the argument it has value because of limited supply. Cryptocurrencies are in *unlimited* supply. There can be infinitely many cryptocurrencies, and now there are cryptos not even based on blockchain (eg IOTA), so not even blockchain is impervious to innovation.
